snippet: The recent strength of the British pound reflects the relative strength of the economy and should settle over time, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney was quoted as saying in an interview on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: BoE's Carney Says Sterling Should Settle Over Time
headline.main: BoE's Carney Says Sterling Should Settle Over Time

lead_paragraph: The recent strength of the British pound reflects the relative strength of the economy and should settle over time, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney was quoted as saying in an interview on Saturday.
